com.codecool.thehistory

Interface TheHistory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TheHistoryArray, TheHistoryArrayList, TheHistoryLinkedList

    public interface TheHistory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(java.lang.String text)
      Adds the 'text' to the container of the implementing class which stores all the text
      void clear()
      Empties the stored text
      void removeWord(java.lang.String wordToBeRemoved)
      Remove all occurrences of a word from the stored text
      default void replace(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to)
      DON'T rewrite this method! replaces all occurrences of sentences or words with sentences or words.
      void replaceMoreWords(java.lang.String[] fromWords, java.lang.String[] toWords)
      Replaces all occurrences of a sentence or part of a sentence with another (part of a) sentence.
      void replaceOneWord(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to)
      Replaces all occurrences of a word to another word.
      int size()
      Returns the number of words in the stored text

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(java.lang.String text)
        Adds the 'text' to the container of the implementing class which stores all the text
        Parameters:
        text: - a string containing words separated with spaces

      • removeWord

        void removeWord(java.lang.String wordToBeRemoved)
        Remove all occurrences of a word from the stored text
        Parameters:
        wordToBeRemoved: - only one word. No spaces just the word otherwise it won't remove anything

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of words in the stored text
        Returns:
        the number of words the stored text contains

      • clear

        void clear()
        Empties the stored text

      • replaceOneWord

        void replaceOneWord(java.lang.String from,
                    java.lang.String to)
        Replaces all occurrences of a word to another word. NOTE: replace() method uses this method!
        Parameters:
        from: - all occurrences of this word will be replaced
        to: - all occurrences of 'from' will be replaced with this word

      • replaceMoreWords

        void replaceMoreWords(java.lang.String[] fromWords,
                      java.lang.String[] toWords)
        Replaces all occurrences of a sentence or part of a sentence with another (part of a) sentence. The order of words are important. Also the 'fromWords' and 'toWords' arrays are not necessarily same sized. NOTE: replace() method uses this method!
        Parameters:
        fromWords: - array of words what should be replaced
        toWords: - array of words which should replace the words of 'fromWords'

      • replace

        default void replace(java.lang.String from,
                     java.lang.String to)
        DON'T rewrite this method! replaces all occurrences of sentences or words with sentences or words. The tests are using this method instead of replaceOneWord() or replaceMoreWords().
        Parameters:
        from: - the sentence or word what needs to be replaced
        to: - the sentence or word which replaces the sentence found in 'from'
